title: Napo_coin

content: NapocoinTHE CRYPTOCURRENCY BUILT FOR FAST TRANSACTIONWhat is NapocoinNapocoin is a peer-to-peer Internet currency that enables instant, low cost payments to anyone in the world. Napocoin is an open source, global payment network that is fully decentralized without any central authorities. Mathematics secures the network and empowers individuals to control their own finances. Napocoin features faster transaction confirmation times and improved storage efficiency than the leading math-based currency.10 second block targets1400 coins per blockHalve every 3.5 million blocks~9.8 billion total supply64 MB block size6400 transactions per secondWebsite:https://napocoin.net/Discord:https://discord.gg/puCqghU82xTwitter:https://twitter.com/Napo_coinDiscord:https://discord.gg/puCqghU82xExplorer:https://explorer.napocoin.net/Exchange:https://exchange.napocoin.net/

comments.author: BTC50
comments.body: In addition to XMR, cpus can focus on SugarChain or LightningCash, both of which have a speed of 5 seconds. The former has no pre-mining and has a wider global distribution

comments.author: synthgauge
comments.body: This is the machine gun. 6400 transactions per second, what a bloat that is going to cause. Bots crawlers, fee farmers will be all-in on creating more spam. Blockchain is meant for a smooth experience delivery to the end user. I have another suggestion. Fire ppl assigned to form the foundation and use that money for giveaways for random beggars. Ah I forgot u dont have the foundation nor money.

comments.author: Napo_coin
comments.created_time: October 06, 2022, 11:56:49 AMLast edit: October 22, 2022, 04:09:51 AM by Napo_coin
comments.body: Napocoin 2.0 update ideas neededHi everyone,Your voices have been heard, many of you suggested the importance of asic-resistant, hence neoscrypt is the first thing we are going to add to Napocoin 2.0. Some of you also said how bad this coin is, therefore I am here to beg for your enlightenment to grow our coin and our community.If you have any ideas regards to Napocoin 2.0 please jump to our discord server and tell us! https://discord.gg/puCqghU82xPlease contribute if you can: https://github.com/Zetalon0/Napocoin/tree/2.0
